headline: Surface Disinfectant Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Reckitt Benckiser, Procter & Gamble, and 3M Lead Through Strategic Portfolio Focus, Market Expansion, and Operational Transformation
summary: Explore the comprehensive Surface Disinfectant Companies Quadrant, an in-depth analysis of the global surface disinfectant market. This report evaluates 92 companies, with the top 11 recognized as quadrant leaders. Surface disinfectants, formulated with active agents like quats, alcohols, and hydrogen peroxide, combat bacteria, viruses, and fungi on non-living surfaces, crucial for infection control in diverse sectors from healthcare to public spaces. headline: Ecolab and SCG Sign MOU to Enhance Business Competitiveness and Drive ESG Progress Toward Net Zero
summary: Ecolab, a global leader in water, hygiene, and infection prevention solutions and services, and SCG (Siam Cement Group), ASEAN's leading business conglomerate, have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) in view of five year partnership to strengthen SCG's competitiveness through efficiency gains and cost savings, while advancing its ESG strategy as a pathway to Net Zero.
